page.title: 17BROUGHTY FERRY FOR A HOLIDAY
page.content: { Broughty Ferry,}situated on the River Tay,is a lovely suburb of Dundee,with its beautiful sandy beach and places of interest.It has a cinema and bingo hall for the evenings and a museum in {Broughty Castle,}which lies by the beach,for a rainy day,and swimming in the Tay is perfect on a warm day. { Claypotts Castle}is a fortified house lying in pleasant grounds,and it is open to the public,with a low admission charge.There are plenty of shops to stroll around in and they are good shelter if bad weather strikes! Broughty Ferry also has some fairly large parks and open spaces,with tennis courts,a bowling green,a putting green,crazy golf and other sports facilities.The pleasure boat'Coral Star'takes its passengers to Perth and back along the Tay and on a sunny day it would be enjoyable.
